entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating early this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 10 this morning and minus 3 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 15.
